mapper.select: select compname,quotestatus, reqquote, no from (select s.compname, q.quotestatus, q.reqquote, q.no, row_number() over(order by q.reqquote desc) as rnum from quotation q, startup s where s.id = q.compid) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY reqquote DESC

select compname,orderstatus, reqorder from (select s.compname, p.orderstatus, p.reqorder, row_number() over(order by p.reqorder desc) as rnum from production p, startup s where s.id = p.compid) MP WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY reqorder DESC
mapper.delete: delete from quotation q where no=#{no}
